attributes.action: Make banks to make their credit and debit cards overlap in dates
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are some banks which issue cards say for example expires 31/5/09 and their new one starts on 1/6/09. This has caused problems in the past when some shops, internet shopping websites and call centres cannot accept payment from these cards 2 days before expiry. These people cannot use their new card as it's valid yet! 

Other banks offer cards so customers have 2 cards to use on the same account for a month.

I know the inconvenience of this only happens for 2 days every 2 years, but it's the principle!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
